description:
Kawachi is continuing his training, but still hasn’t come up with an idea for what kind of bread he will submit for the contest preliminaries. Will he come up with something in time?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Won`t Lose!! I`ll Fight Ya with Osaka Bread!
Je ne vais pas perdre !! Le pain d’Osaka me fera gagner !
Makehen!! Oosaka Pan de Shoubu ya!
ไม่ยอมแพ้หรอก จะชนะด้วยขนมปังโอซาก้านี่ล่ะ!
負けへん!! 大阪パンで勝負や!
